content: दृष्टिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} [दृश्-भावे क्तिन्] {@--1@} Seeing, viewing. {@--2@} Seeing with the mental eye. {@--3@} Knowing, knowledge. {@--4@} The eye, the faculty of seeing, sight; केनेदानीं दृष्टिं विलोभयामि <ls>V. 2</ls>; चलापांगां दृष्टिं स्पृशसि <ls>Ś. 1. 24</ls>; दृष्टिस्तृणीकृतजगत्त्रयसत्त्वसारा <ls>U. 6. 19</ls>; <ls>R. 2. 28</ls>; <ls>Ś. 4. 2</ls>; देव दृष्टिप्रसादं कुरु <ls>H. 1.</ls> {@--5@} A look, glance. {@--6@} View, notion; क्षुद्रदृष्टिरेषा <ls>K. 173</ls>; एतां दृष्टिमवष्टभ्य <ls>Bg. 16. 9.</ls> {@--7@} Consideration, regard. {@--8@} Intellect, wisdom, knowledge. {@--9@} (In <ab>astrol.</ab>) Aspect of the stars. {@--10@} Light (प्रकाश).
